summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2041 for the improvement of Nineteen Avenue Northwest and Twenty-first Avenue Northwest, each from West Sixty-fifth Street to West Seventy-fifth Street, and Twentieth Avenue Northwest and Twentieth Avenue Northwest produced from Sloop Place to West Seventy-fifth Street, all in the City of Seattle, by constructing sewers therein with all appurtenances necessary for the proper sewerage and drainage of said district; under Ordinance No. 20553, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
